reviewText: I have been watching this purchase as best I can. I have had issues with episodes not being to read at all or freezing. Episode 4, 14, 100-103 won't play at all on my dvd player. Other than these issues I've enjoyed watching Bleach

I can honestly say that I don't regret buying this. It's great to start a couple if friends on this series. I would say my biggest complant is at time the subs are horrible an make no sense! So I would have to pause the DVD and explain what was going on.
Other than that I was happy with this purchase! If you haven't seen Bleach yet for whatever reason, I would highly recommend watching it :)
